data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Rizal, Philippines a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Rizal, Philippines
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, we ask for 454 new simple churches in the state of Rizal, Philippines. Place a simple church in every community of the 2,272,500 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 7 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Rizal, Philippines who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 316,555 believers living in the state of Rizal. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Manobo, Umayamnon people. Make the Manobo, Umayamnon people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Rizal, Philippines. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Rizal that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Rizal, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.
